Detailed Description

The header file describes the ZCL Alarm Cluster and its interface.

The file describes the types and interface of the ZCL Alarm Cluster

Author:
Microchip Corporation: http://www.microchip.com
Support email: support@microchip.com

Copyright (c) 2018, Microchip Corporation. All rights reserved. Licensed under Mirochip's Limited License Agreement.

Definition in file zclAlarmsCluster.h.

Define Documentation

#define ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT   2

ZCL Alarms Cluster server side commands amount.

Attributes and commands for sending alarm notifications and configuring alarm functionality.

#define ZCL_DEFINE_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS (   resetAlarmCommandInd,
  resetAllAlarmsCommandInd,
  getAlarmCommandInd,
  resetAlarmLogCommandInd 
)
Value:
DEFINE_COMMAND(resetAlarm, ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_RESET_ALARM_COMMAND_ID,  \
                     COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),  \
                     resetAlarmCommandInd), \
    DEFINE_COMMAND(resetAllAlarms, ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_RESET_ALL_ALARMS_COMMAND_ID,                    \
                     COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
                     resetAllAlarmsCommandInd), \
    DEFINE_COMMAND(getAlarm, ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_GET_ALARM_COMMAND_ID,                                 \
                     COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
                     getAlarmCommandInd), \
    DEFINE_COMMAND(resetAlarmLog, ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_RESET_ALARM_LOG_COMMAND_ID,             \
                     COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
                     resetAlarmLogCommandInd)

#define ALARMS_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE (   clattributes,
  clcommands 
)
Value:
{                                                                                           \
    .id = ALARMS_CLUSTER_ID,                                                                  \
    .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY},\
    .attributesAmount = ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,                          \
    .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                                   \
    .commandsAmount = ZCL_ALARMS_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                              \
    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands                                                         \
  }

ZCL Alarms Cluster server side defining macros.

This macros should be used with #ZCL_DEFINE_ALARM_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES for ZCL Basic Cluster server side defining in application.

Parameters:
attributes- pointer to cluster server attributes (ZCL_AlarmClusterServerAttributes_t)
Returns:
None
